sample_docs: Videonetics technology enhances modern video surveillance systems by automating the monitoring and analysis of video and providing actionable security intelligence or detection events of interest to the user. Videonetics provides the next generation intelligent video management and video analytics software solutions in different domains including: Homeland and enterprise security Moving and non-moving object detection and tracking Videonetics products are affordable, scalable, easy to install and use. They can easily be integrated with existing surveillance systems to make them more productive and responsive. Several case studies show that the incremental costs of a video analytics enabled system provide a compelling return on investment due to potentially large savings in operational and capital costs. May 2009 Videonetics Presence of Vehicle Detection technology, Installed At Major Intersections in Kolkata Complete 6 Months Of Successful Field Trials for Traffic Management February 2009 Cradle Technologies Selects Videonetics Technology Video Analytics System Solutions For Its Video Server Solutions February 2009 Cisco Chooses Videonetics Technology as a Technology Development Partner June 2009 PRESS RELEASE Infinova and Videonetics announce partnership to offer intelligent video analytics system solutions WHITE PAPER Intelligent Video Analytics

Intelligent Video is the Future In today's digital age, we are constantly bombarded with visuals from a plethora of devices every day. To make the most of this rich visual data, it is critical to develop the ability to make sense of these fleeting images, discern patterns and get a clear understanding of their relevance. Only then, one can generate information that is actionable for man or machine. This is where Videonetics comes in. Intelligent Video Management Software OS, Database, Browser and Camera Independent Distributed, Multi-Site, Unlimited Camera Support System Health Check & Monitoring Smart Urban Video Analytics Debris & Litter Detection Graffiti & Vandalism Detection Intelligent Monitoring of Objects, Crowd, Faces, Perimeter and Vehicles Designed for Tough Indian Environment Server & Edge Based Analytics Support Automatic Alert Generation & Event Handling Intelligent Traffic Management System No Seat Belt Detection System Detection of Use of Cell Phone While Driving No Helmet Detection System Automatic Number Plate Recognition Red Light Violation Detection Wrong Way Detection & No Parking Highly secure and reliable Flexible and instantly scalable Easy setup and maintenance Pay as you go convenience Ongoing refinement & addition of new features Face Detection and Recognition Least Invasive Identification Technology Detect, Capture & Recognize Faces Unlimited Face Database Support Branching our services to a multitude of sectors Serving for a single domain was never our goal. The vision that laid the foundation had always been to emerge out as a single platform serving the future computing needs of an assortment of different sectors. The customer centric approach and the provision for countless customizations in our feature rich software facilitate us in catering to the multiple sectors with superior proficiency. Man Hours of Software Research and Development Making the World a Safer, Smarter, Happier place At Videonetics, we combine the spirit of innovation and excellence with rich experience and undaunted ambition. We help you make sense of surveillance, by providing you with an end-to-end solution for a wide range of applications. No matter where you are located, and which sector you belong to, Videonetics will make your world a safer, smarter, happier place. December 9, 2019 Videonetics honored with STPI Export Award 2018-19 for achieving the Highest % of growth in (IT/ITES) Exports November 20, 2019 Videonetics Achieves Number 1 Position as Video Management Software Provider in India unveils IHS/Informa Tech Research 2019 September 21, 2019 Videonetics to partner with 7th edition of PACC 2019

Explore More Whitepaper Intelligent Evolution: How True AI is Redefining Safety, Efficiency, and Innovation in Industry 4.0 Read Whitepaper Book a Free Strategy Session World's First AI & DL powered Unified Video Management Platform Simplifying Complexities, Impacting Lives As new technologies emerge, the ability to extract actionable intelligence from ever-increasing volumes of video data with accuracy and speed becomes critical for proactive monitoring and advanced surveillance. We leverage our innovative and patented technology for solving real-world problems in a variety of demographics by offering open, flexible and end-to-end video management solutions. Our Unified Video Management Platform, powered by indigenously developed Artificial Intelligence and Convolutional Neural Network-based Deep Learning framework, provides operational efficiency, data-driven insights situational awareness and actionable intelligence. At the same time, our neoteric approach lets us create products and solutions that are integrated yet modular, ONVIF compliant, OS & hardware agnostic, cloud-ready, scalable and interoperable. While creating a distinct identity in the global market with our futuristic solutions, we also emphasise protection against cybercrime. Our GDPR-compliant cyber-secure solutions ensure data safety at all levels through industry benchmark encryption methods and authentication techniques. We are committed to providing extraordinarily robust and efficient video management software solutions, striving to make the world a safer, smarter, and happier place through the transformative potential of AI-enabled video analytics. Experience the future of video management with us and witness how it streamlines operations, enhances security, and unlocks new possibilities for your organisation. for Demo Market leader across verticals 80 + Airports Secured 300K+ Cameras Connected 150 + Cities Secured 100 + Enterprises Secured 25K+ Traffic Lanes Monitored The Power to Make Smarter, Informed Decisions Make well-informed decisions with the world's first Unified Video Management Platform and Video Management Software that makes data interpretation extremely robust, smart and efficient. Explore More Solutions Across Industries In this ever-changing world of visual data, where every piece of information counts, industry leaders value a cross-functional framework that simplifies operations across industries. Our in-depth knowledge of industries and their security and surveillance requirements enables us to provide tailored video management system solutions, enhanced by cutting-edge AI enabled video analytics. From people management, safety compliance, and disaster management to pandemic management, surveillance, coordination, and threat detection, we harness the power of AI to offer valuable insights and streamline decision-making for your organisation's security and efficiency. Experience the transformative potential of our AI-enabled Video Analytics for your business today. Cities From traffic surveillance to urban, municipal, and civic monitoring, our AI-powered Video Management System streamlines integrated operations to protect citizens and assets. Aviation Our comprehensive solution offers optimised airport operations while adhering to regulatory guidelines, detecting high threat and vulnerabilities with zero downtime for effective decision making. Industrial Harness the power of our AI-powered Video Management System, which enables you to detect anomalies and verify threats in real-time, meet industry compliance, ensure safety compliance, and seamlessly integrate with other systems for smooth and productive operations. Critical Infrastructure Protect critical infrastructures against potential threats, improve operational efficiency and make better decisions with active monitoring and improved situational awareness. Banking & Finance Leverage our cutting-edge Video Management System for assured 24x7 surveillance, and safety of customers, assets, employees, and staff, and improve the overall banking experience in distributed facilities and branches. Education Detect unusual activities with active monitoring and insightful data to safeguard educational premises and protect students and teachers from external or internal elements that hinder the teaching-learning process. Retail Our surveillance system lets you precisely measure customer footfall, collect data about stores, analyse consumer patterns and prevent inventory shrinkage/leakage. Success Stories At Videonetics, it's not about innovation itself; it's about solving real problems and achieving success. We collaborate closely with customers when developing products and solutions to determine what works best for them. But don't just take our word for it; read what our clients have to say about working with us.
